solution_line_template: In six years, Ellen will be {ellen_current_age}+{years_in_future} = <<{ellen_current_age}+{years_in_future}={ellen_age_in_six_years}>>{ellen_age_in_six_years} years old.
If Martha is twice Ellen's age in six years, she is {multiplier_for_twice}*{ellen_age_in_six_years} = <<{multiplier_for_twice}*{ellen_age_in_six_years}={martha_age}>>{martha_age} years.
